title: DAZ3D - Genesis Generation X2 plus some Addons
description:
NO SERIALS INCLUDED - just PC & Mac versions of the products.

Genesis Generation X2
---------------------
 
https://cdn.pximg.xyz/433bce92c28b418aea6139372286b217.jpg

www.daz3d.com/catalog/product/view/id/18321

Genesis Generation X2 (short GenX2 or just GenX) transfers morphs from legacy Poser figures to Genesis figures and between different versions of Genesis. Transfer your favorite shapes of older figures to the new Genesis figures. GenX2 may either transfer a complete character comprising several morphs as one combined morph, or it may transfer each single morph including all automated correction morphs, so you can work with the transferred morphs in your Genesis figure just as in the original figure. GenX2 also translates poses or expressions with morph values and morph injections or shaping presets to be used with the transferred morphs. Full description available from link above.

GenX and GenX2 AddOn Gen3 for V3 and M3
---------------------------------------
 
https://cdn.pximg.xyz/071a4aa499d0472f7ef235001618f70d.jpg

www.daz3d.com/catalog/product/view/id/14326

This add-on extends Genesis Generation X2 (GenX2) to the world of the generation 3 figures. Now, it's possible to transfer morphs for Victoria 3 and Michael 3 to Genesis and Genesis 2. Full description available from link above. 

Note: Morph transfer to Genesis 2 requires GenX2 and the GenX2 AddOn for Genesis 2.


GenX2 AddOn for Genesis 2
-------------------------
 
https://cdn.pximg.xyz/bb497b9f89c8ad5a19d7f98a52061603.jpg

www.daz3d.com/catalog/product/view/id/18322

This add-on extends Genesis Generation X2 (GenX2) to the world of Genesis 2. Now, it's possible to transfer morphs from Genesis and supported Poser figures to Genesis 2 Male and Female. In addition, morphs may be transferred from Genesis 2 to Genesis or between the Male and Female version of Genesis 2. The latter includes HD morphs and is done without re-calculation. Full description available from link above.


GenX2 AddOn for Genesis 3
-------------------------
 
https://cdn.pximg.xyz/261dfa7f476e5920fef3aa46da1b0261.jpg

www.daz3d.com/catalog/product/view/id/32599

This add-on extends Genesis Generation X2 (GenX2) to the world of Genesis 3. Now, it's possible to transfer morphs from Genesis, Genesis 2, and supported Poser figures to Genesis 3 Male and Female. In addition, morphs may be transferred from Genesis 3 to Genesis and Genesis 2 or between the Male and Female version of Genesis 3. Full description available from link above
